Start:

1.							**++++++
EAX: 0000100000000110000001000000001
EDX: 0000100000000110000001000000001

00000001 => --000001 => 1 => "B" => 01000010
  							++++++++
EAX: 0000100000000110000001001000010

Shift
EAX: 8
EDX: 6

2.							**++++++
EAX: 0100001000001000000001100000010
EDX: ++++++0000100000000110000001000

MOV al, dl
  							**++++++
EAX: 0100001000001000000001100001000

00001000 => --001000 => 8 => "I" => 01001001

  							**++++++
EAX: 0100001000001000000001101001001

Shift
EAX: 8 ROR
EDX: 6 SHR

3.							**++++++
EAX: 0100100101000010000010000000011
EDX: ++++++++++++0000100000000110000

MOV al, dl
  							**++++++
EAX: 0100100101000010000010000110000

00110000 => --110000 => 48 => "w" => 01110110

  							**++++++
EAX: 0100100101000010000010001110110

MOV al, dl
  							**++++++
EAX: 0111011001001001010000100000100
